attributes.action: Make all UK pay for prescriptions to boost NHS to end discrimination of England
attributes.background: The Scottish and Welsh get free prescriptions whilst the English still pay. The Scottish and Welsh should also pay and help fund the NHS and end the English from carrying them. It is discrimnation against the English by the UK government

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

Healthcare is a matter devolved to the Scottish Parliament and the Welsh Assembly, and is therefore not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
